Key Match Events: Kylian Mbappé scored a penalty on his return after breaking his nose
Robert Lewandowski equalized from a penalty at the other end 11 minutes from time
Dayot Upamecano tripped Karol Swiderski, resulting in a Poland penalty
Pre-Game Insights: Antoine Griezmann was left out of the starting XI, with Bradley Barcola getting his first start for France
Didier Deschamps went with the front three that played together for Paris Saint-Germain over the past season
Post-Match Reflections: France will now head to Duesseldorf for a last-16 tie next Monday against the runners-up in Group E
France are now on the same side of the draw as Portugal, Spain and Germany, which they would have avoided by topping the group
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in sweltering conditions
Kylian Mbappé wore a mask to protect his injured nose
Others: Poland had already been eliminated before this game, becoming the first team to go out after losing their opening two matches
